titleStmt.title: An enquiry into the present state of affairs and in particular, whether we owe allegiance to the King in these circumstances and whether we are bound to treat with him, and to call him back again, or not.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Published anonymously; attributed to G. Burnet by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: stained, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
